chapter.text: 82|1|nowpel del mekh ban be  reah bek .
82|2|ning nowpel del php teanglay ban bak thleak khe  t ch khtei  .
82|3|ning nowpel del tukasamoutr trauv ban ke bamphtoh laeng  .
82|4|ning nowpel del phnaur teanglay trauv ban ke bamphosa laeng .
82|5|mnoussa mnea k nung ban doeng nouv avei del khluon ban sang kanlongomk  ning avei del khluon mintean sang .
82|6|ao mnoussa lok.  tae avei tow del ban baokabrasa anak aoyothveu  shi ri k champoh mcheasa robsa anak da thkomthkaeng
82|7|del ban bangkeut anak  ruoch thveu aoy anak mean roubreang penhlenh  promteang phdal aoy anak nouv lokkhan la samoromy
82|8|knong roubreang namuoy del trong mean chetnea  trong nung  bangkeut anak noh
82|9|min dauchnaoh te.  phtoytowvinh puok anak bercha bdeseth nung thngai  chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) towvinh .
82|10|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok anak ku mean anak tam khleameul ( mea la ai kat) .
82|11|chea anak thkomthkaeng  ning chea anak kttra( real ampeu robsa anak) .
82|12|puokke( mea la ai kat) doeng nouv avei del puok anak br pru td .
82|13|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del ban sang ampeula ku  sthet knong thansuokr na ai m .
82|14|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok del br pru td ampeuaeakrak  ku sthet knong nork cheu hi m .
82|15|puokke nung chaul tow knong thanonork noh now thngai chomnoumchomreah(thngai  barlok) .
82|16|haey puokke min ach kechvih pi vea ban laey .
82|17|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei noh
82|18|banteabmk  tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei  noh
82|19|kuchea thngai del kmean bokkol na mneak ach meanamnach avei chuoy  dl bokkol mneaktiet ban laey .  haey se ch kei  d sa me  r ch now thngai  noh kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh temuoyokt .
